alert.note: Alert for Leon; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 9:23AM CST until January 26 at 9:46AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Navasota River Near Easterly affecting Leon and Robertson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navasota River near Easterly. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Friday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 12.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 21.0 feet late tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Thursday evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
